content:
I am a master’s student at Peking University. My research interests include Urban Computing, Computational Social Science and Complexity, Complex Networks. I am currently a research assistant at the Department of Aerospace and Geodesy, Professor of Geospatial Big Data Management in the Technical University of Munich, Germany.
 You can reach me via email: liuzhihang@stu.pku.edu.cn
   Download my resumé.

title: Zhihang Liu
